tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE flight_schedule (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
    mission_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE flight_schedules (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    flight_name VARCHAR(50),
    departure_date DATE,
    departure_time TIME,
    arrival_date DATE,
    arrival_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE mission_plans (
    mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(50),
    destination VARCHAR(100),
    launch_date DATE,
    launch_location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE FlightSchedules (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    departure_date DATE,
    departure_time TIME,
    arrival_date DATE,
    arrival_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE MissionPlans (
    mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(255),
    launch_date DATE,
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    mission_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    mission_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (mission_id) REFERENCES MissionPlans(mission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FlightSchedules (
   flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   departure_date DATE,
   arrival_date DATE,
   origin VARCHAR(50),
   destination VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE MissionPlans (
   mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   mission_name VARCHAR(50),
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   mission_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Astronauts (
   astronaut_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   astronaut_name VARCHAR(50),
   nationality VARCHAR(50),
   age INT,
   experience_years INT
)

CREATE TABLE Spaceships (
   spaceship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   spaceship_name VARCHAR(50),
   capacity INT,
   status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE FlightSchedules (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
  origin_location VARCHAR(50),
  destination_location VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE MissionPlans (
  mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR(100),
  launch_date DATE,
  destination_planet VARCHAR(50),
  mission_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE CrewMembers (
  crew_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crew_name VARCHAR(100),
  role VARCHAR(50),
  mission_assigned INT
)

CREATE TABLE Spaceships (
  spaceship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  spaceship_name VARCHAR(100),
  model VARCHAR(50),
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE Resources (
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(50)
)
